programme.title: The Army of North Virginia
programme.short_synopsis: The last stand of General E Lee in North Virginia on 9th July 1865.
programme.medium_synopsis: Why  Senator Warren Rudman quit, the importance of 9th July to the Army of Northern Virginia, and the story of Sir Lionel Sackville-West, Ambassador to America in 1888.
